Package familymapserver.data.access

Class UserAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • familymapserver.data.access.Access
      • familymapserver.data.access.UserAccess
  • public class UserAccess
extends Access
    Contains methods for accessing user data in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      UserAccess​(Database db)
      Creates a new UserAccess object.

      void add​(User user)
      Adds a new user to the database.
      void clear()
      Removes all users from the database.

      Creates a new table to hold users if it doesn't already exist in the database.

      Gets a user from the database.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(User user)
         throws DBException
        Adds a new user to the database.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be added to the database
        Throws:
        DBException - if a field is missing or invalid, if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • updatePersonId

        public void updatePersonId​(User user)
                    throws DBException
        Updates the person id for a user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to update, with the person id set to the new value
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • get

        public User get​(java.lang.String username)
         throws DBException
        Gets a user from the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user to be found
        Returns:
        an object containing the user's data, or null if no user was found with the given username
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • clear

        public void clear()
           throws DBException
        Removes all users from the database.
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • createTableIfMissing

        protected void createTableIfMissing()
                             throws DBException
        Creates a new table to hold users if it doesn't already exist in the database.
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs
